import { React, useState } from 'react' //Redux import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' //Material UI import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card' import CardContent from '@material-ui/core/CardContent' import CardMedia from '@material-ui/core/CardMedia' import Typography from '@material-ui/core/Typography' import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField' import ButtonGroup from "@material-ui/core/ButtonGroup" import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' import ShareIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Share' import AddIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Add' import InputAdornment from '@material-ui/core/InputAdornment' import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton' import MoreVertIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreVert' import Menu from '@material-ui/core/Menu' import MenuItem from '@material-ui/core/MenuItem' //Components import makeStyles from '../../styles/Lists' import List from './List' import test from '../../images/test.jpg' import cat from '../../images/cat.png' const Lists = () => { const styles = makeStyles() const list = useSelector((state) => state.homePage) const [count, setCount] = useState(0) //====================================================================== return ( <>
